This is a classic example of the ultimatum game. I'm taking a very greedy approach here, offering Bob only $1.  I'm hoping he'll be rational and accept, as even a small amount is better than nothing. However, there's a risk he'll reject it out of spite, hoping to get more in the next round.  We'll see how it plays out!

While I'm still greedy, I realize I need to be more realistic. Taking 40% is a good outcome considering the potential for losing everything if we keep going.
